description:
The Laver Cup is an international indoor hard court men's team tennis tournament between Team Europe and Team World. Team World is composed of players from all continents except Europe. This year's Laver Cup is of particular interest as the highly decorated Tennis player Roger Federer announced he will retire immediately following his attendance at this year's tournament.

This is a market on who will win the Men’s Doubles match featuring Roger Federer and Rafael Nadal versus Jack Sock and Frances Tiafoe, scheduled to start around 3:00 PM ET on September 23. This market will resolve to “Federer/Nadal” if Roger Federer and Rafael Nadal win the match, or to “Sock/Tiafoe” if Jack Sock and Frances Tiafoe win the match.

If for any reason the winners are not declared by September 30, 11:59:59 PM ET, this market will resolve 50-50.
